scripts.test:local: docker run --rm --name test-helper -v instant:/instant --network instant_default openhie/package-test local
scripts.test:local:dev: docker run --rm --name test-helper -v </absolute/path/to/instant>:/instant --network instant_default openhie/package-test local
scripts.test:remote: docker run --rm --name test-helper --network host -v instant:/instant -v </absolute/path/to/instant/.env.remote>:/instant/.env.remote openhie/package-test remote
scripts.test:remote:dev: docker run --rm --name test-helper --network host -v </absolute/path/to/instant>:/instant openhie/package-test remote
scripts.docker:instant:win: docker volume rm instant & docker run --rm -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock -v %USERPROFILE%\.kube:/root/.kube/config:ro  --mount='type=volume,src=instant,dst=/instant' --network host openhie/instant:latest
scripts.docker:instant:aws: docker volume rm instant ; docker run -it --rm -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock -v ~/.kube/config:/root/.kube/config:ro -v ~/.minikube:/home/$USER/.minikube:ro --mount='type=volume,src=instant,dst=/instant' --network host -v ~/.aws:/root/.aws openhie/instant:latest
scripts.eks:cluster:create: eksctl create cluster -n instant-openhie -r af-south-1 -t t3.medium -N 2 --version=1.17
